section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides limited STUN server (RFC 5389) support for &kamailio;. It's built for providing STUN support in the SIP signalling channel, not being a standalone STUN/TURN server.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
None

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
None
